Reviews.Title: Exactly what I needed!!!
Reviews.Author: superminignome
Reviews.Content: Exactly the cords i needed to finish my security camera installation!Work great in the weather with my outdoor cameras!

Reviews.Title: Slight video loss, but overall, good product GREAT price.
Reviews.Author: Brett Maternowski "maternowski.us"
Reviews.Content: Slight video loss, but overall, good product GREAT price. I used this to run through my attic for a four camera security system. The wires seem to be of the same quality as the original that came with my system. MORE than enough length for what I needed the for. I wish I measured before buying because there is some video quality loss. I would buy again, just shorter.

ProductInfo.Features:
All in one video and power cable
Plug and Play ready. For camera with DC power only
Cable functions for BNC or RCA connection
3 Pack of 150 Feet video/power cables in black
6 of  BNC to RCA adapters included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 3 x 150ft Feet Extension Video Power Cables BNC RCA DVR Security Camera Wires Cords for CCTV Home Surveillance with Free Adapters 1YN
